content.719926/t 900 1700/w sunny: spring_day_ambient/-885 8/farmer -500 -500 0 Caroline 5 7 1/mail CarolineTea/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sunroom/viewport 5 8 true/pause 1000/showFrame Caroline 22/doAction 6 7/pause 500/doAction 6 7/pause 1000/showFrame Caroline 4/pause 500/warp farmer 5 13/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -4 0/faceDirection Caroline 2/pause 100/speak Caroline "哦，嗨！早安啊，@。很高興你能進來……#$b#我一直想給你展示一下的……這是我的私人日光室。"/pause 500/pause 500/speak Caroline "所以，你覺得怎麼樣？"/pause 500/quickQuestion #很漂亮！#很舒適。#這裡太熱了……#沒有我的農場好！(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "謝謝你！我付出很多努力才布置好的……$h"(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "確實……我走進來的時候，立刻就有幽靜和放鬆的感覺。這裡真的很治癒！"(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "哦？我自己也覺得這種溫暖的感覺很安神。$s#$b#如果你待著不動的話會感覺更好。"(break)emote Caroline 16\pause 100\speak Caroline "哦，不過你是專業的……對我來說，這只是一項愛好。"/pause 500/faceDirection Caroline 1/speak Caroline "你瞧，這裡是我的庇護所……是我能一直找到寧靜的地方……"/pause 300/faceDirection Caroline 2/speak Caroline "在這裡喝我自家種植的茶葉茶也是極好的！來，我們來喝一杯……"/pause 300/playSound coin/showFrame Caroline 20/pause 1000/playSound sipTea/showFrame Caroline 21/pause 500/showFrame Caroline 20/pause 500/playSound sipTea/showFrame Caroline 21/pause 500/showFrame Caroline 20/pause 500/playSound gulp/pause 1000/quickQuestion 喝一杯？#是#否(break)farmerEat 614\pause 1000(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "行，沒事……"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/playSound sipTea/showFrame Caroline 21/pause 500/showFrame Caroline 20/textAboveHead Caroline "真好喝"/playMusic SunRoom/pause 1500/speak Caroline "我很喜歡每天來這裡喝一杯新泡的茶。#$b#這是我自己的小儀式……#$b#呃……容我解釋一下……$h"/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/cutscene greenTea/pause 1000/viewport 5 8 true/pause 1000/speak Caroline "我希望能說得通……#$b#有時生活會很忙亂，所以擁有這樣的一項愛好也是很不錯的。"/pause 150/showFrame Caroline 0/pause 200/speak Caroline "這裡隨時都歡迎你過來休息，如何？"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/move farmer 0 4 2 true/fade/viewport -5000 1000/pause 1000/end warpOut
